description.value:
You're skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Bo Staff]{Bo Staff}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Dueling Cape]{Dueling Cape}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Spiked Chain]{Spiked Chain}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Sword Cane]{Sword Cane}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Whip]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.
